effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Target loses its held item. Neither the user nor the target can recover its item with recycle. If the target has multitype or sticky hold, it will take damage but not lose its item.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Target loses its held item. Neither the user nor the target can recover its item with recycle. If the target has multitype or sticky hold, it will take damage but not lose its item.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Target loses its held item. Neither the user nor the target can recover its item with recycle. If the target has multitype or sticky hold, it will take damage but not lose its item.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user slaps down the foe’s held item, preventing the item from being used during the battle.
flavor_text.platinum: The user slaps down the foe’s held item, preventing the item from being used during the battle.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user slaps down the foe’s held item, preventing the item from being used during the battle.
